title: Beautiful One-Bedroom with $1500 off with 12-mo lease signing!
posting_body: ['Bancroft Towers', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x452', 'Want more information?', '<URL>', '1 \xa0bedroom 1 bath 650Sq.', 'Ft.  $2,145/mo', '* Unit 306 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 309 - Available', 'Now', 'A nice place to call home', 'Enjoy the renovated features inside this one-bedroom, one-bathroom model at Bancroft Towers.', 'Wake up each morning in a room with wall-to-wall carpeting and a large closet with floor-to-ceiling mirrored doors.', 'Prepare meals in a kitchen that has stainless steel appliances and stone tile flooring.', 'The adjacent living room stands out thanks to striking two-tone paint and either wall-to-wall carpeting or wood-look LVT flooring.', 'Along with comfortable features at home, residents also gain access to exciting amenities.', 'For a change of scenery, put on your swimwear and hit the pool.', 'You can also visit the recreation room and socialize with neighbors.', 'If you prefer more options for outdoor activities, you can take the mile-long trail at Marina Park.', 'Contact the leasing office to learn more.', 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT AMENITIES:', '* CeilingFan', '* Courtyard view', '* DishWasher', '* Disposal', '* Range', '* High-rise view-lower floors', '* Single walk-in closet', '* Microwave', '* Extra patio', '* Refrigerator', '* High-rise view-middle floors', '* Corner unit', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES:', '* Gate', '* CoverPark', '* Elevator', '* F/T night attendant', '* Separate game room', '* Regular-sized pool', '* Laundry', '* 24hr.', 'Emergency maintenance', 'MANAGED BY:', 'Vasona Management', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x452', 'Address:', '13475 Bancroft Ave San Leandro, CA 94578', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
